item.title: ABB-STAR Joint Project
item.description: With autonomous ground vehicle (ClearapthPath Husky) with a dual-arm manipulator (ABB Yumi), we can perform much more complex tasks. In this project, we are exploring what we can do when combining them. In the end, we successfully built a robot that can perform auto-navigation to press target button. In this project, I mainly focus on SLAM and auto-navigation. For more details, please refer to the project page @ STAR Lab , with cool demo video there :)
